1254680.name: Collective Card Game - Starlight Pendant - All Cards Forever Pass
1254680.description:
Unleash your full deck building potential with the Starlight Pendant. With it, you'll have immediate access to every current and future card released in Collective.

All future Amber you would earn is converted to Gold, one-to-one. The Card Blueprints you own are converted to Gold equal to half their Amber value. Your unused Amber is converted to half that amount in Gold.

Important: After purchasing this, it'll be applied to your Collective account the next time you log into the game. Make sure you log into the account you want to apply it to.
1254680.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
